{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c}
Shapeshift into a werebear and charge forward, dealing {c_number}{payload:PAYLOAD_DAMAGE}{/c} and knocking down enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds.
Defensive Skill: Transform into a werebear and run over enemies.

Damage increased to {c_number}{payload:PAYLOAD_DAMAGE}{/c}.
Knockdown duration increased to {c_number}{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}{/c}.
